about_the_game:
Embark on an unforgettable journey through breathtaking fantasy worlds where every corner is a canvas for your wildest adventures. Explore beautifully crafted worlds, rich with diverse landscapes, discovering dungeons, creatures, and loot. Make new friends and companions and then take them on adventures. Kick back and fish or grow something delicious. Discover new recipes and make something unique. Stumble upon endless hidden secrets. Amass a collection, or befriend every creature.

Unleash your imagination and shape the world to your liking. Build awe-inspiring structures, from cozy cottages to towering fortresses, using a robust construction system that offers limitless possibilities. Craft intricate items and gear, using the resources you gather from the many environments.

Customize your home world and your play style. Unlock new features and toggle them on or off as you see fit to customize your gameplay experience. If you don't feel like farming or cooking today, turn it off, and no loop drops or quest rewards will fill up your inventory with any unwanted associated materials until you turn it on again. Your game, your way!

Echoed Realms is a stylized fantasy adventure extraction game where you can explore and gather resources and friends from other realms to design and build your own realm. It can be played solo or in a party of up to 4 player friends, NPC friends, or pets. Invite your player friends to visit your realm, or go and visit theirs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 processor 14450HX (20M Cache, up to 4.80 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek ALC 3266
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.80GHz 2.80 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce Rtx 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek ALC 3266

short_description: Echoed Realms is a Casual Stylized Fantasy RPG focused on player experience and dynamic gameplay. Play it your way, even if that changes every day.
